about.title: ABOUT ME
about.p1: Full Stack Developer with a Backend soul. I am currently in the final semester of my Web Application Development degree at UOC. My background allows me to build solid, scalable architectures, always prioritizing clean code.
about.p2: I used to craft prosthetics with millimeter precision. Now, I apply that same obsession for detail to my code. If I can troubleshoot a myoelectric prosthesis, I can certainly fix that bug that’s been breaking production.
